alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 6:55PM EDT until July 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of De Funiak Springs to 6 miles northeast of Bonifay, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Chipley, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Union, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Pleasant Ridge and Center Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
